Source code for core.datamodel

from sympy import Function, Symbol



[docs]class Parameter(Symbol):  # superclass for ECOMOD params
    """
    Superclass for ECOMOD parameters. 1-1 with sympy.Symbol
    """
    def __new__(cls, name, **kwargs):
        obj = Symbol.__xnew__(cls, name)
        obj.__dict__.update(kwargs)
        return obj




[docs]class Phase(Function):
    """
    Superclass for ECOMOD parameters. 1-1 with sympy.Function
    """
    def __new__(cls, name, dim, desc, *args):
        obj = Function(name)(*args)
        # TODO: add dim desc as attributes of class
        return obj

if __name__ == "__main__":
    t = Parameter('t', dim=1, desc=2)
    c = Parameter('c', dim=2, desc=3)
    a = Phase('b', t, c, dim=1, desc=2)
    print(type(a.name))
    print(a.dim)
